attributes.action: Petition to request a path down The Warren House Road in Wokingham
attributes.additional_details: I have been in contact with Wokingham Council and a serious incident has to occur before this road is treated as needing a path. Please sign this Petition and prevent an accident. Wokingham is expanding constantly and with the new houses and a relief road we have little hope of making this a safer road. Our family go to Keephatch and St Crispins - none of us are able to walk our Children to school
attributes.background: The Warren House Rd from The Warren Pub is a D-Restricted Rd. Many people have to walk towards traffic or juggle their balance on the edge of a ditch. More houses are being built and a relief road down this road for London Rd. I struggle with a Pram. This is our only way into Wokingham by foot.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://www.wokingham.gov.uk/council-and-meetings/decisions/e-petitions/
